title: About Ethical Hacking Days
text: Welcome to the Ethical Hacking Days, hosted by the Cybersecurity and Cyber Intelligence Club of ENSA Tangier. This is the leading event in Morocco dedicated to the most pressing issues in cybersecurity. Our event provides a platform for professionals, students, and industry leaders to share insights, discuss innovative solutions, and build the future of secure digital ecosystems. Through hands-on workshops, inspiring talks, and competitions like the Capture The Flag (CTF), we aim to foster a culture of collaboration and learning.
